Our Team

The people behind the research

Dr. Nelson Dantzler

Dr. Nelson Dantzler is the principal researcher at Practical Research, LLC. He specializes in the area of emotional culture research, which focuses on how employees feel in the organization. He has performed focused research in women-owned businesses, start-ups, and corporate environments. In addition, he has performed financial research across a multitude of fortune 100 companies within a cross section of industry sectors for over 30 years. He looks forward to working with your organization to optimize employee performance, employee satisfaction, and employee engagement through emotional culture strategies.
